article_title: Alyssa Adams, Bristol Senior Little League, Softball
article_text:
The content you are attempting to view is more than 24 hours old. If you’re already a subscriber to Bucks County Courier Times please log-in below.

If you’re not a subscriber, you can subscribe now for the first month for just 99 cents! Select Subscribe to get started.

og.description: WHAT SHE DID: Pitched 17 innings with a 1.24 ERA and won two of three starts, including a no-hitter in Bristol’s 6-0 victory Wednesday over Vidalia, Louisiana. At the plate, batted .368 and had game-winning RBI in 4-2 victory Thursday over Maunabo, Puerto Rico. In the field as a pitcher and third baseman, had 1.000 fielding percentage with 11 assists and six putouts.
